index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing code enforcement, adding a new Section 22.206.217 to the Seattle Housing and Building Maintenance Code, SMC Chapter 22.200 et. seq., and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 22.200.030, 22.204.050, 22.206.130, 22.206.200, 22.206.220, 22.206.230, 22.206.250 and Section 22.206.280.
